Faculty of Natural Science IMS

Welcome to the Faculty of Natural Science Inventory management System Here, we're all about keeping things organized and efficient. Whether you're tracking supplies or equipment we've got you covered. Our system aims to streamline the process, making inventory management a breeze. At the University of Guyana, we value transparency, accountability, and smooth operations.
